item.description:
I sent this out a couple weeks ago as well. But if you are interested in giving back with improv.  I am the director of a local group called Laughing Matter who performs at homeless shelters, rehab centers, etc. and we are actively seeking performers for upcoming spring and summer shows.

We meet every other Monday for rehearsal and performances are usually on Sundays once or twice a month.

Tonight we are meeting to practice and play some games at 7:30 at MIT 50 Vassar St. Cambridge.  We will be meeting in the lobby and taking it from there.

If you are coming or plan to come please shoot me a text or call.

 

If you have any questions, let me know!

Cheers!

Jason
item.name: Want to improvise and give back? Come on out tonight!
